listing.listing_description:
Offering cultured and luxurious accommodation with great access to some of the best sights in Venice, guests will find this apartment exceedingly well-located. Offering dashes of Italian craftsmanship via the ornate fireplace and greenstone washbasin, the sumptuous furniture and in-house AC add character and comfort, with the Gallerie dell'Accademia and St Mark’s Basilica just a short walk away.

Touches of old-world charm run throughout this apartment, ranging from the exposed rafters to the classically-inspired art pieces that decorate each room. Relaxing in the living room, guests will appreciate the rich and plush couches, before standing to take in an impressive view of the nearby flagstone-paved piazza. This completely restored apartment makes self-catering exceedingly simple, with a fully-equipped kitchen and innovative dining area allowing guests to dine in style, with the supplied satellite TV and central heating system ensuring that time spent in the apartment is completely comfortable.

From this apartment, guests can rest easy that the best aspects of Venice are nearby. A short walk will take you to the banks of the Grand Canal, while gelato, fire-baked pizza and famous Venetian coffee is just steps away. The must-see facade of St Mark’s Basilica is similarly close by, while the graceful arches of the Rialto Bridge, rising over the blue waters of the canal, are likewise just a short walk away. The priceless historical artworks of the Gallerie dell'Accademia are also in the neighborhood.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find scenery to impress and decor to enchant at the spectacular Villa Alexandra. Perched on a hillside above the coast in the Taormina area, this Sicily vacation rental commands views over the sea to the horizon. Inside, thoughtfully chosen furnishings and seven suite-style bedrooms give this luxury property magazine-worthy appeal.

Your holiday at Villa Alexandra begins with a welcome drink—and will soon start to blur into sunny days spent by the saltwater pool. A terrace with loungers, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table makes it easy to enjoy the views during the day, and a TV and Wi-Fi make it easy to relax into the evenings.

Inside, the villa has more than 5,000 square feet of beautifully designed living space. Glass walls separate the terrace from a sleek open-concept great room, where you can stretch out on a pair of sectionals, gather around a glass-topped dining table in sculptural chairs or try out local seafood in a fully equipped kitchen with gorgeous stone countertops.

There is one bedroom with a king bed and six bedrooms with double beds; all seven bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. Together, they can accommodate up to fourteen friends or an equally large group of extended family. Like the great room, the bedrooms are clean and contemporary, with neutral tones and playful accents such as oversized knit throws.

The villa’s setting close to Letojanni, a popular resort, puts you just a short drive from the closest shopping and dining and Paradise Beach Club. Practice your serve on the nearby tennis court or take a day trip to the Castiglione di Sicilia golf course. For a quick coffee or a honeymoon-worthy dinner, drive into Taormina, where boutiques, restaurants and cafés fill the town’s historic center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step out from the shade of this spacious old-world Italian townhouse, and instantly feel the sunshine and sea breeze of southern Sicily. Designed to the aesthetics of this historic region, guests will love the tiered pool, airy upper terrace and story-book bedroom balconies. With easy access to one of Avola’s best beaches, Palazzo Calea is ideal for embracing the laid-back spirit of Italian summers.  

With cool, lofty bedrooms, guests can awake and throw open the upper level doors, effortlessly letting in the light and air of the Mediterrean. Located just a short walk from the beach, a plunge into the private pool or an afternoon spent sun-dozing in the bright garden is just what’s required after morning on the hot sands. With modern, open and bright interiors, enjoying a mid-day coffee or the rich taste of a nightcap grappa on the shaded upper terrace is a particular pleasure - as is grilling freshly-caught fish on the villa’s complimentary barbecue.  

Step outside this listing, and you’ll soon find yourself immersed in the rich historic and culinary aspects of Sicily. Within a few minutes walk, the open piazzas of Avola await, with charming cafes and the very freshest of seafood and life-affirming Italian cuisine. Take a walk along the town’s calming promenade or amongst the famed almond groves of the surrounding hillsides, or explore the layered history of this most ancient part of the Medditerrean, following in the footsteps of the Greeks, Romans, Moors, and others, who have left their own unique marks on the landscape of the region. Finally, relax under the shaded table in the villa’s courtyard, tasting the sweetness of a Nero d’Avola, the unique red wine named after this seaside city.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a London holiday to inspire at Wetherby Place. Set in a renovated artist’s cottage and studio that dates from the 19th century, this five-bedroom Kensington vacation rental is now an oasis of contemporary style. Its tucked-away location near Gloucester Road feels like a secret, but is just steps from shopping, dining and many of the city’s must-sees.

This home opens to its own private terrace with garden views—a rare luxury in the heart of the city. After a day exploring the city, unwind with an al-fresco glass of wine and watch the stars come out, or cozy up inside around the gas fireplace, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. Both air conditioning and heating mean you’ll be comfortable no matter what the English weather serves up.

A fold-away glass wall connects the terrace to a gallery-like living room, whose cream-colored walls and furnishings are the backdrop for unique paintings and sculpture. Or follow the staircase down to the great room, which has living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, all filled with exquisite modern pieces.

Five bedrooms make Wetherby Place spacious enough for groups of friends or extended family. There are two bedrooms with king beds—one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a shared bathroom—as well as two bedrooms with double beds and en-suite bathrooms. The fifth bedroom has a twin bed.

While this beautifully appointed home is an attraction in itself, its appeal also comes from its great location. Wetherby Place is 2 miles or less from Buckingham Palace, Kensington Palace and the Victoria & Albert Museum. It’s also close to Harrods, so it will be easy to tote all your shopping back home, plenty of cafés, where you can stop for a pick-me-up after sightseeing, and a variety of restaurants, where you can relive your honeymoon over a multi-course dinner.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled on the edge of Buseto Palizzolo, a small village 20 km from Trapani, is Ager Costa — one of our most welcoming villas in Sicily. The location is quiet but not overly isolated, with lots of sunshine, countryside views and other village houses nearby.

On warm days, cool off in the beach-style private swimming pool, or lounge on one of the sun chairs. An outdoor barbecue is a great way to cook up a casual meal—once it’s ready, enjoy it in the alfresco dining area. A daily tidying service is included, and you’ll find a basket of goodies waiting upon your arrival. Guests are also welcome to pick any seasonal vegetables from the villa’s garden.

Inside the villa you’ll notice touches of exposed stone and a pleasant mix of antiques and contemporary pieces throughout, and more importantly, that the furnishings are both tasteful and comfortable. The main kitchen comes fully equipped with plenty of appliances, including an 8-burner gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and two refrigerators. An upstairs kitchenette is convenient for preparing light snacks and refreshments.

The villa’s eight bedrooms accommodate up to 16 guests. Each suite features an ensuite bathroom with a private shower and air conditioning, while most offer mini bar and LCD televisions. A junior suite is ideal for young families, as are bedrooms 6 and 7 which share an interconnecting door. Two bedrooms feature French beds (47 inches / 120 cm wide) which is between the sizes of a single and a double bed.

There are plenty of charming towns and archeological sites to explore nearby, including the medieval old town center of Erice and the temple of Segesta. The shops and restaurants of Buesto Palizzolo are less than a 3 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A charming retreat tucked into the woods, villa Casolare is the perfect spot for a family vacation or romantic getaway. With its fairy-tale exterior and rural location, the three-bedroom house feels like a secret hideaway, yet is still close enough to the cities of Tuscany, like Pisa, Florence, Siena and Lucca, for day trips.

Just through the property’s gated entrance, you’ll find broad lawns, groves of shade trees and well-tended flower beds. A terrace off the dining room offers a table and chairs for al fresco dining, and a charcoal barbecue lets you cook outside, too. Terraced landscaping leads to the pool, which has its own sunny terrace. Even though Casolare looks like it came out of a storybook, the villa is air-conditioned and equipped with Wi-Fi.

Inside, the villa is elegant and modern, with warm, neutral walls and trim, traditional-style furnishings gathered around a fireplace and classic patterned drapes in the living room. The dining room has the same balance of stateliness and comfort, with a long table that seats eight, floral-upholstered chairs and a Murano-style chandelier for sparkle. In the kitchen, you’ll find a large range, modern appliances like a juicer and food processor, and sleek pale-wood cabinets and stone countertops.

Each of Casolare’s three bedrooms has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. There are two bedrooms on the ground floor, and one bedroom on the third floor. (The living areas, along with the home’s main entrance, are on the second floor.) The bedrooms are decorated with more restful neutral tones, set off by antique chests, four-poster beds and even painted closet doors in one of the rooms.

Thanks to the villa’s location on a larger estate once owned by the bankers to the Medicis, there’s plenty to explore nearby on foot. It’s only a 5-minute drive to town, where there’s a restaurant, grocery store and seasonal truffle tastings and sales. A clinic and tennis court are 10 minutes away by car, and a hospital and train station are 15 minutes away. Play a round at the golf course, 20 minutes away, or spend a day at the beach, 45 minutes away. When it’s time to leave, the airport is a 35-minute drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Villa Saletta estate, once owned by the Riccardi family (bankers to the Medici), covers approximately 1,760 acres. In total, there are more than 20 old farmhouses on the estate, mostly dating back to the 1800s. Each one has its own story to tell, being unique and individual in size and location.
Three of these farmhouses have been restored so far. Every restored villa has its own private grounds with electric gates, outdoor swimming pool, barbecue and comfortable shaded seating areas.
Please note estate roads are not suitable for vehicles with poor ground clearance

listing.listing_description:
Treat yourself to views stretching from the Bay of Palma to the Sierra de Tramuntana at Can Gabrielet. This Mallorca vacation rental makes the most of its stunning location in the town of Sa Coma de Bunyola with gorgeous indoor-outdoor living spaces and an expansive rooftop terrace. Four bedrooms mean you can invite up to eight friends or extended family on a holiday in the sun and scenery.

While away lazy days by the saltwater infinity pool or in one of two shaded outdoor living areas. For even better views, follow the steps to the private 1,000-square-foot rooftop terrace, which features a covered dining area for ten and a barbecue. The villa also has its own gym, as well as a sound system and Wi-Fi.

Slide open the glass walls in the great room to connect the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen to the pool terrace—and better take in the views. Mid-century-inspired furniture and playful accents such as flamingo-print pillows give the open-concept space a feeling of laid-back cool.

Can Gabrielet has one master bedroom with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to an outdoor space, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as an exclusive dressing room and a jetted tub.

Don’t just admire the landscape during your stay at this luxury property—get out and enjoy it! The villa is just a short drive from the towns of Soller, Valldemossa and Deia, where you’ll find shopping, dining and an inviting beach, and a 15-minute drive from the city of Palma, where you can explore ancient castles, cathedrals, museums and fortresses. For a great day trip, try a drive to the charming seaside village of Portals Nous.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the slopes of Verbier at Agate. This stunning vacation rental is set in a coveted location overlooking the piste and the town’s Place Blanche. Its interiors are equally enviable, with traditional details, chic furnishings and four suite-style bedrooms, and the property is available on a fully catered or self-catered basis.

A fully catered holiday at Agate includes a chef at breakfast and dinner, canapés and champagne six days of the week, two days of ski instruction and around-the-clock driving service. Self-catered stays include housekeeping and a lift pass delivery service. Leave your car in one of the apartment’s two underground parking spaces and take in the views from the furnished, south-facing terrace, or treat yourself after a day on the slopes in the private spa and sauna.

An open-plan great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen offers plenty of space to relax with family and friends. The wood paneling and wood-burning fireplace create an atmosphere of warm, welcoming luxury, while floor-to-ceiling sliding doors and sleek furnishings add a modern twist.

Each of the four bedrooms at Agate has an en-suite bathroom. Spend a romantic interlude in the honeymoon-worthy master bedroom, which has a king bed, fireplace and its own terrace, or sleep soundly in one of the three bedrooms with double beds.

Verbier has long been a favorite in the Swiss Alps for its long runs, off-piste options and celeb-friendly après-ski scene, and Agate puts you in the center of the action. This ski-in, ski-out villa is only a 1-minute walk from the Médran lift, a 3-minute walk from shopping and dining around the town’s Place Centrale and a 5-minute drive from the Savoleyres lift.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Charming and elegant, Villa Cima perches above the waters of Lake Como on the grounds of the Villa d’Este, one of Europe’s grandest hotels. This refined four-bedroom vacation rental dates from the 19th century and gives guests the comfort of a private home fit for nobility and the amenities of a luxury resort. Invite friends and family to spend an unforgettable holiday in the estate’s 7,000 square feet of space, all against the dramatic scenery of the lake and hills.

Your stay at Villa Cima includes the use of the amenities at Villa d’Este and its sporting club, from the shared pools, sauna and hammam to the gym, tennis courts and bicycles available to borrow. Enjoy your choice of an in-villa continental breakfast or a buffet at the resort restaurant each morning, and ask the 24-hour concierge if you need help with reservations or excursions. Of course, you can also spend your vacation simply relaxing on the villa’s private lakefront terrace.

The villa was originally built in 1814 by Caroline of Brunswick, the then Princess of Wales, to house a count and countess. Though it has since been updated, the refined antique furnishings reflect its royal heritage. Carved trim, leaded windows and vine-covered walls lend a storybook feel to the exteriors, while inside, terrazzo floors and Murano chandeliers are both beautiful and traditional. Several well-appointed sitting rooms boast lake views, and the formal dining area can seat eight. In contrast to the rest of the villa, the fully equipped kitchen is practical and modern.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Cima features an en-suite bathroom, a private balcony or terrace and views of Lake Como. There are two suites with king beds and two with queen beds, all with stately accents such as floral print bedding, high ceilings and tasseled drapes that speak to the 19th century origins in an understated way.

Named one of the best hotels not just in Lombardy or Italy but in the world for its breathtaking location, Renaissance gardens and opulent decor, Villa d’Este is a destination in itself and popular for honeymoons, destination weddings and other special occasions. The surrounding area is equally rich in history and attractions, from the restaurants and shops in Cernobbio, a 5-minute walk from the villa, to the churches and museums of the nearby city of Como. For a memorable day trip, drive to Bellagio and visit its historic villas and revel in its spectacular views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in a landscape famously dotted with medieval towers, rolling hills and olive groves, this impressive villa offers the complete experience in serene Tuscan countryside. Designed with a touch of farmhouse style, guests will love the huge living space, broad stone terrace and refreshing, lengthy infinity pool, especially a day exploring nearby villages and centuries-old piazzas in nearby Lucca.

Built amidst a series of sun-drenched hills, Villa Il Diavoletto is offers a captivating view of active olive plantations and cypress groves, with the brilliant splash of the pool’s blue and the classic white walls of the property helping to make it stand out in the landscape. Guests can begin the day by stepping out through broad double doors to the wonderfully simple alfresco dining area, savoring a rejuvenating coffee and deliciously-fresh local pastry in the streaming sunshine. That same sunshine flows through the windows of the open-plan living area, which nevertheless ensures a shady, cool and welcoming group space, while fantastic meals can be prepared in the fully-equipped kitchen. The massive views offered from the bedrooms are the real feature, with guests able to enjoy the creeping glory of the Italian dawn breaking over the sleeping landscape outside, as songbirds chirp in the fresh morning air. 

This villa offers the best of countryside peace as well as excellent access to the historic town of Lucca, complete with the very finest dining options and architectural marvels like the oak-topped Guinigi Tower. A local drive will reveal majestic gardens and gorgeously preserved stately homes that seem to be around every corner in this storied region of Italy. Peaceful pools, natural springs and carved statues hide in grottos and waysides across countryside. Just fifteen minutes away is Pinocchio Park in Collodi, celebrating the birthplace of one of children’s fiction’s most beloved figures, complete with sculptures, ornamental ponds and puppet shows, while the historic metropolis of Florence is just an hour’s drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy sunny days and dreamy evenings at Sunset Paradise. As its name suggests, this beautiful vacation rental boasts incredible views off the west coast of Ibiza—not to mention a private setting and chic contemporary architecture. Its location near the resort of Cala Tarida is only minutes from the beach and a short drive from Ibiza Town and the airport.

Soak in the Mediterranean sun from outdoor living areas with a pool, plenty of loungers, a ping-pong table, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for twelve. After watching the sun set over Conejera Island, watch the stars come out from the rooftop deck—or step inside to watch Apple TV and share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Sliding glass doors, nearly floor-to-ceiling windows and an open-plan layout link the interiors of Sunset Paradise to the outdoor living areas. Neutral tones and natural textures lend a casual yet chic vibe to the open-concept living and dining areas, and in the fully equipped kitchen, flat-fronted cabinets are equally sleek and stylish.

There are four bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and two in the guest house; all six have en-suite bathrooms. The main house has three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a jetted tub, and one with two twin beds. The guest house, with one king bedroom and one with two twin beds, could be used as a secluded honeymoon suite or quiet accommodations for a family with children.

Though Sunset Paradise looks out over the sea and countryside, it’s less than a 10-minute drive from the nearest beach, the legendary Cova Santa venue and the town of San Jose. Restaurants and bars line the white sands of Cala Tarida, but if you’re looking for more excitement, Ibiza Town is only 20 minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a ski holiday like a rock star at Heinz Julen Loft. This one-of-a-kind Zermatt vacation rental breaks away from traditional Swiss Alps architecture and uses glass, steel, polished concrete and ultra-modern furnishings to create a contemporary space like none other. It’s a unique destination for a break with family, a getaway with friends or even a honeymoon in the mountains.

The loft is available on a self-catered basis, which includes firewood, or a fully catered basis, which includes breakfast and dinner on six days out of seven, as well as dedicated service by the villa’s staff. After a day out on the slopes, soothe muscles in the sauna and hot tub, give an impromptu concert on the grand piano, share photos via Wi-Fi or put a few logs in the fireplace and settle in by the television.

A stay at the loft feels like peeking into a private home, thanks to the distinctive collections of books and artwork that fill the space. The villa is laid out around a main floor with living and dining areas that feature portable seating and even a table that can be raised or lowered as you wish. Climb the stairs or take the elevator to the mezzanine level to find the fully equipped kitchen and a bar area.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a double bed and an en-suite bathroom. There is one bedroom on the main level, one on the mezzanine and one master suite that takes up the entire top floor of the villa.

While no cars are allowed in Zermatt, you’ll hardly need one as the villa is close to ski lifts, shopping and dining. Heinz Julen Loft is only a 2-minute walk from the Omnia Hotel lift and an 8-minute walk from another ski lift. You can also walk to the town’s main street, which is lined with boutiques, restaurants and bars.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The traditional charm of beamed ceilings and stone walls fits seamlessly with state-of-the-art details at this modern recreation of an Italian farmhouse. While it’s surrounded by the cypress trees and vineyards of the quintessential Tuscan landscape, it also has an open-concept layout not found in historic homes. Pick up produce in the hill town of Casole d’Elsa and day-trip to Siena and Florence.

Spot field, forest, and distant hills from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, sitting areas, a row of loungers in the sunshine, and alfresco dining under a pergola. Serve dinner from the barbecue and pizza oven, or step inside to watch a show on the smart TV and share holiday updates via Wi-Fi.

Stone arches, wood-beamed ceilings and a large hearth hearken back to the past in the living room of this vacation rental, where 3 sitting areas make it easy to catch up with friends and family. By contrast, a wall of windows lines one side of the open-concept dining area and fully equipped kitchen, which is laid out around a gleaming blue and brass range.

This luxury property has 3 bedrooms with king beds, including one that opens to a terrace, and 1 bedroom with 2 queen beds. All 4 bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning and, like the main living areas, plenty of traditional style, whether in the form of a four-poster bed, wood floors, or windows with painted shutters.

With concierge service included in your stay, it’s easy to make the most of your time in Italy. Book a cooking or wine-tasting class, take a bicycle or horseback ride through the landscape, reserve a tee time at a nearby golf course, or take a honeymoon from the everyday at a spa. If you’re keen to explore, plan day trips to the cities of Siena and Florence.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Chamonix, the iconic French ski paradise, was the host of the first ever Winter Olympics in nineteen twenty-four. Since then, the quiet hamlet has been considered one of the most desirable ski locations in the world. Nestled in a valley between two mountains, Chalet Alta is the perfect home base for your French Alps ski vacation.

Relaxing after a long day on the slopes is easy at Chalet Alta. Cool off in the indoor swimming pool, warm up in the sauna, or simply curl up by the wood burning fireplace. Alta’s media room is another great space for lounging with friends and family - featuring a wet bar stocked with beer, sprits, and soft drinks. Also included with the chalet rental are, chef services, daily housekeeping, in-resort chauffeur, breakfast, and a four course dinner served with wine, six nights a week.

Built in the style of a traditional French ski lodge, Alta is warm, cozy, and inviting. Adding a twist of modern architecture, Smart Home technology and thoughtful design makes it the quintessential luxury ski chalet. The living room leans more to the traditional side of the spectrum with heated wood flooring, comfortable seating, and stone columns, all focused around a beautiful wood burning fireplace. The dining room features a large wood table, with space for twelve.

Each of the five bedrooms at Alta has a double size bed, an ensuite bathroom, and direct access to the outside terrace. If you need space for kids or a few extra guests, three sets of bunk beds occupy the basement, allowing for Alta to house up to sixteen.

If you feel like a trip in to town, Chamonix is an eight minute drive from the chalet. Home to beautiful restaurants, cafés, nightlife, and boutique shops, it’s a charming town to spend an afternoon exploring.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Domaine des Trois Bories is a stunning luxury villa near the hilltop village of Gordes in the Vaucluse Mountains of Provence. Secluded on a beautifully landscaped estate just a few minutes from the village center, the villa invites you to relish the rustic lifestyle of this legendary region, with a private tennis court and pool, ample outdoor living spaces, and panoramic vistas of the Luberon. With four bedrooms suites and a children's room, this vacation rental is ideal for families and groups of friends desiring a unique yet quintessential taste of Southern France.

Savor enchanting hours in the Provençal light, dipping into the pool after a tennis game or hike and reveling in the sun on elegant chaises longues. Sip refreshments in the pool house lounge, and relish afternoon meals under a gorgeous ceiling of exposed wood and terracotta tile. The glass walls of the pool house frame a beautiful prospect of the Alpilles hills, while a lantern lights your nighttime gatherings. An upper terrace, extending from the interior living areas, is perfect for morning coffee or evenings aperitifs while admiring the sweeping views.

Abundant windows and glass doors imbue the home with exquisite air and light. Both the living room and enclosed veranda feature lounge and dining areas, served by a fine contemporary kitchen with chef-quality appliances and a breakfast bar. Luminous white walls complement the villa's beautiful artwork and bucolic accents of natural wood and stone.

Each bedroom offers a superb blend of rustic charm and modern style infused with lovely light and views. The master suite includes a king bed and a deluxe bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and tub. Each of the three adult suites has a queen bed, while the children's room features two twin-size beds. Two of the queen suites are on the lower level and open to the garden.

Venture two and a half kilometers to the heart of Gordes, where you can stroll the city's famed calades (stone-paved streets) and view the famous 10th-century chateau. Surrounding sites include the architectural treasures at Bories Village and the Abbey of Sénanque. Avignon is about thirty-seven kilometers west, while Aix-en-Provence and several national parks make for easy daytrips.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Uncover modern luxury close to the historic charm of San Gimignano at Villa Iris. This beautifully restored vacation rental overlooks the town’s famous towers from a perch amid the vineyards and is close enough to Siena and Florence for a day trip. Make the six-bedroom villa your home for a relaxing holiday with family or a base for exploring Tuscany with friends.

Villa Iris sits on more than an acre of private grounds surrounded by quintessential Italian countryside: olive groves, vineyards and hills rolling into the distance. Enjoy the views from outdoor living areas with a stone swimming pool, jetted tub, bocce court, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Inside, you’ll find amenities from a fitness room and ping-pong table to a wellness area with a sauna.

The villa itself was once a brick workshop and dates back to 1737. Thanks to a careful restoration, it’s now comfortable and chic, with traditional details like cotto floors and beamed ceilings set off by casual modern furnishings in the living and dining rooms. The fully equipped kitchen expertly pairs rustic cabinetry with state-of-the-art appliances and Carrara marble surfaces to stunning effect.

There are three bedrooms on the villa’s ground floor, all with king beds, and three on the upper story: two with double beds and one with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

The grounds and scenery around Villa Iris make it the perfect setting for a family reunion, a milestone birthday or anniversary celebration or even a destination wedding—and the honeymoon after. If you’ve just come to sightsee, it’s an easy walk through the vineyards to a nearby restaurant, where you can dine or try a wine tasting, and the towers of San Gimignano. Drive to Siena, Florence or Volterra for the day, and if you have time, continue your trip in Lucca or Pisa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the heart of Menaggio, Italy, this villa takes luxury to the next level. Pop art hangs on the intricately decorated walls while herringbone floors flow throughout. The fireside living room takes centre stage when stepping into the first floor of the Palazzo—a renovated, historic building constructed in 1731. Spend the day on Lake Como or sauntering through the picturesque town centre.

Antique and modern décor seamlessly come together, popping against original frescos, to create a unique, quintessentially Italian atmosphere. An antique library table hosts up to 8 for dinner. Have your whole crew join together in the sitting area where a plush selection of furniture awaits to kick back and converse on. The light, airy den features painted wood ceilings and a tranquil space to curl up with a book or stream your favourite show. Stroll through your private garden to get to the condo’s communal area as well as the shared swimming pool. 

The Juliette balcony off the kitchen is a quiet place to sip your morning espresso. Hop on the ferry to explore nearby Bellagio, Cadenabbia, or Varenna. Your choice of golf clubs are within driving distance and the Menaggio Tennis Club is a short 5-minute walk away. Cycle along the panoramic promenade or through a variety of routes spanning hundreds of kilometers around the lake. Hiking through the surrounding hilltops will offer a photo ready, bird’s eye perspective of the quaint town below.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Traditional on the outside, modern on the inside and surrounded by gorgeous scenery, Villa Coral is a picture-perfect setting for a Mallorca holiday. This charming vacation rental was recently renovated and offers spacious, stylish living areas and five bedrooms for up to ten guests. What wasn’t updated, however, were the views—panoramas of blue sea and rocky hillsides—and a location close to beaches and oceanfront resort towns.

Revel in the Mallorca sunshine from outdoor living areas with a pool and plenty of loungers, then heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table. For your comfort and convenience, this luxury property also has air conditioning, laundry facilities and a security system.

The villa’s elegant exteriors bring to mind traditional estates, but inside, it’s all modern. Vaulted, wood-beamed ceilings soar over two sitting areas, a dining table for ten and even the fully equipped kitchen, while clean-lined furnishings have a relaxed, pared-down vibe. Sliding doors to the terrace let you open the living spaces to the sunshine and breezes outdoors.

Villa Coral has four bedrooms in its main house and one in a garden suite. In the main house, there’s one bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with queen beds. The garden suite is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed and jetted bathtub that opens to the main pool terrace. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.

Spend your stay reconnecting with friends and family or exploring the Andratx area around the villa. It’s a short drive to the nearest beach, Cala Llamp, whose stony shoreline, clear waters and lovely views offer a quintessential Mallorcan experience. You’ll find shopping, dining, nightlife and more in Puerto d’Andratx, also within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Watch sailboats navigate their way around the Plemmirio peninsula from the master’s 4-post bed at this oceanfront villa in Sicily. For a closer look, follow the stone walkway to private ocean access. Work on your tan in a sunbed, or enjoy the view from the open-concept living room at this stylish, modern villa. When you’re ready to explore, start with a hike through the nature reserve.

Taking advantage of its picturesque coastal setting, Villa Angelina’s ocean-facing exterior boasts 3-levels of floor-to-ceiling glass. Outside, follow the wood pool deck to the stone patio where a banquet-style alfresco setting and a built-in barbecue await. Move to the lawns, where you’ll find lush gardens and shady spots to sit and read. Inside, the soothing color palette and clean lines of modern architecture create a space that contrasts the vibrant natural hues of Sicily, while celebrating them to their fullest. Let the fully-equipped kitchen inspire your culinary creativity. Keep up with fitness routines in the home gym. And, watch the sunset from the plush sofa in the terrace lounge.

You’re bound to find something interesting, beautiful, and unique where the sea meets the shore, and Plemmirio has plenty of shoreline to explore. Grab your camera and your hiking boots before you head out to snap a few incredible vacation photos at the Caves of Pillirina, Ortygia Archaeological Site, and Maddalena Nature Reserve. While you’re out, you’ll inevitably stumble upon numerous beach areas in the reserves, so pack a towel and bathing suit too. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled on the hillside jungle of Sierra Tramuntana, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, this private luxury villa is the perfect home base for exploring the northern coast of Mallorca. With views overlooking the cove of Deia and the ocean, Ca’n Miquelet boasts some of the best sunsets on the island. And, accommodations for eight, all bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, make this luxury home ideal for your next unforgettable family vacation.

Designed and decorated to honour its natural surroundings, you’ll love Ca’n Miquelet’s vibrant take on traditional Spanish colonial architecture. The blues of the ocean, lush greens of the hillside, and natural textures of stone create a relaxing tropical atmosphere, sure to inspire serenity. The living room is a playful setting, with warm, inviting furniture and plenty of openings to the terrace, you’ll be surrounded by fresh ocean breeze at all times. There are several other quaint little spaces throughout the main living area, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee. The dining room and kitchen are beautifully decorated with an elegant flare. High-end appliances, marble counter tops, and gorgeous cabinetry make the kitchen an exciting place to prepare meals.

Inside, the formal dining space has seating for eight. On the terrace, the alfresco dining area resides under the covered portion and has space for eight as well. Beside it, an “L” shaped couch is perfect for relaxing and watching the sun set. Beyond the covered section of the terrace, you’ll find the swimming pool, sun loungers, and several amazing vantage points for enjoying the ocean view.

For beach access, Cala de Deia is best for swimming, with clear water and a calm setting, it’s great for first time snorkelers. Port de Soller, also within a few kilometres, is a more popular tourist beach. It’s central location, long sandy stretches, and close proximity to bars and restaurants make it an exciting place to spend an afternoon.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Tourist Reference Number: VT/103998

listing.listing_description:
Chalet Orsini is a spectacular chalet in the Swiss Alps on the edge of Verbier. Located just a few minutes from Les Creux cable car, the chalet offers an ideal balance of convenience, seclusion, and truly sublime mountain views. Gorgeous alfresco spaces (including a superb hot tub), exquisite interiors, and five enchanting bedroom suites make Chalet Orsini the perfect vacation rental for ski vacations or summer alpine adventures with family and friends. The catered option includes private chef, hosting, and transport, among other features and services.

The villa's interior is at once spacious and perfectly cozy, with original artwork and lovely antiques evoking consummate alpine elegance and charm. After a vigorous day on the mountain, unwind in the living room over canapés and champagne, kindling a fire in the stunning, wood-burning fireplace. Select a bottle of fine wine from the cave, and gather around the dining table for a privately catered feast. At night, gather in the splendid home theater for a favorite movie, or shoot pool in the parlor with adjoining TV lounge. The beautiful, light-filled kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and it shares a room with a lovely wood table and second wood-burning fireplace—perfect for warm breakfasts before the next adventure.

Top-shelf spa facilities and a multiple terraces deliver next-level luxury. Enjoy a soak in the outdoor hot tub while savoring some of the finest alpine views imaginable, or relax on elegant lounge furniture with a cup of hot cocoa. Reward yourself with a trip to the private spa, refreshing your body in the Hammam and relishing a well-deserved massage.

The chalet features five bedrooms—three with double beds, one with two bunk beds, and one with a bunk bed and trundle bed—sleeping thirteen in all. The master suite enjoys spectacular mountain views, a wood-burning fireplace, an office space, and a private balcony. Two of the guestrooms enjoy beautiful views as well, and one opens to the balcony with hot tub. All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.

Chalet Orsini is perfectly located just a kilometer from Les Creux cable car and just over two kilometers from the heart of Verbier village. The world-class Club de Golf Verbier is just three kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This sublime, five-bedroom waterfront villa in Es Cubells is situated within a gated community in one of the finest luxury residential districts in Ibiza. Featuring an extraordinary overall design, exquisite outdoor and indoor living spaces, panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, and an outstanding location near the beach at Es Torrent, the five-bedroom Villa Yelda is a dream vacation rental on this world-renowned isle of leisure and joy.

Situated on a 700-square-meter estate overlooking the vast expanse of azure sea, the villa includes an expansive outdoor terrace, framed by lush gardens, with ample space for relaxation and entertainment in the sensuous breeze. Numerous connected lounges and niches create an enchanting space for large parties or intimate gatherings, with the veranda's slatted cover providing light or shade as desired. A lovely plunge pool includes a shallow end for children, and you'll also enjoy access to a larger swimming pool in your community. A lovely alfresco table invites you to delectable meals, paired with fine Spanish wine and the Mediterranean breeze. In the fresh morning, enjoy outdoor yoga and a restorative massage.

The villa's luminous interior provides a cool yet cozy setting for festive nights and bright mornings, its elegantly minimalist décor accentuating the presence of the sea. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen, as guest enjoy drinks in the cocktail area. Then gather around the beautiful, ten-person table for a memorable feast, before venturing out for exciting night. Upon returning, cuddle up in the cinema room with your favorite movies, or savor the night air on the illuminated veranda.

The bedroom suites are serene and sumptuous, providing total comfort and privacy for quiet downtime. All enjoy stunning sea views, direct access to furnished terraces, and superb ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom has a king bed, while each of the four guestrooms has a double bed. With room for ten, the villa is ideal for destination wedding guests.

Villa Yelda is ideally located for enjoying Es Cubells and its stunning surroundings. The beach at Es Torrent is within walking distance or a few minutes by car, while San José and Ibiza Town are both a short drive away. You're only fifteen minutes from Ibiza Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Construction Note:  Please note that there is construction near to this villa. Please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Golf Digest and The World Golf Awards have both recognized Quinta do Lago as “Europe’s Best Golf Destination," and at Villa Golf Poente, you’ll be nearby all three of their amazing courses. With six en-suite bedrooms and accommodations for twelve, this villa is the perfect host for a golf trip with friends and family. Throughout the vast estate, you’ll find plenty of indoor, and outdoor, areas with space for the whole group to gather.

From the terrace to the living room, the open-air design of this villa is sure to have you and your guests enjoying the social, free-flowing atmosphere created when indoor and outdoor spaces merge so seamlessly. Stone columns and archways, terracotta highlights, and elegant designer furniture are Golfe poente’s decor, all trademarks of luxurious Spanish colonial style.

After a long day on the course, come home and cool off in the swimming pool, stretch out in a lounger, or kick back in the media room for a relaxing evening. Maybe the chef in your group is eager to get started on dinner. If so, there’s a fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, a Nespresso machine, breakfast bar, and formatting dining for eight. There’s also a barbecue and alfresco dining for twelve on the terrace. If you’d prefer to dine out, there are restaurants and shops located within the resort, as well as, tennis courts, a fitness center, and bicycle rentals.

The, recently redesigned, North Course at Quinta do Lago is the perfect place to start your golf trip, with four tee locations on every hole, this course can accommodate players of all skill levels. Once you’re warmed up, visit the Laranjal Course for a more challenging journey through Algarve’s rolling terrain, making shot selection even more important. If you make it out of Laranjal, The South Course is considered to be Quinta do Lago’s crown jewel. Overlooking the Ria Formosa National Park, this course navigates its way through umbrella pines, lakes, and wildflowers for a scenic and challenging eighteen holes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From the views outside to the playful artwork inside, it’s all about the mountains at this traditional ski chalet. Tucked into a grove of pines on a slope overlooking the peaks, this wood-paneled lodge is a cozy haven with a sauna, storage, and more to help you get ready for the next day on the slopes. Even the location puts you a 5-minute drive from the Mont-Blanc Chamonix runs. 

Leave gear in the dedicated ski storage area and stretch out in the private home gym, then give yourself the luxury of a session in the indoor sauna or a soak in the outdoor hot tub. Once your muscles are soothed, settle in for the evening by the fireplace. 

Even if it’s too dark to see the mountains outside, spot them on the walls of the two living rooms at this vacation rental. Try out France’s famed cheeses and wines around a dining table for 8, or pause at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen to sip a cup from the Nespresso machine. The snug vibe extends to bedrooms with wood-beamed ceilings and fur throws. 

If you want to spend your holiday on the slopes, it’s 5 minutes to the nearest ski area—and 6 minutes to downtown Chamonix for your après. Bring the whole family to Domaine des Planards for a ride on the alpine coaster or a first-time ski session in their beginners’ area, or relive your honeymoon over dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Learn the secrets of wine country at this elegant vineyard estate in Saint-Estephe, France. Explore the entire Cos d’Estournel operation, from harvest to tasting while you’re pampered by a full staff, including a private gourmet chef for all meals. After you’ve wandered the gardens, sampled the vintage collection, and embraced the Medoc lifestyle, head to Bordeaux for a custom-designed city tour. 

You may need a few days to fully take in La Chartreuse, to discover the many functions and traditions of the winery. Luckily, you’ll be living in a mansion decorated with stately furnishings, chandelier lighting, and authentic French architecture. Outside, lush gardens, vineyard, and decorative fountains create endless settings for sipping Espresso, wine tasting, and alfresco dining. 

When you’re on a break from your lessons in wine crafting, rejuvenate in the hammam, spa, or one of the swimming pools. The library is a great place to catch up on some reading. And, there’s a state of the art home gym in case you feel like maintaining your workout routine. The villa comes with Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning, as well as a full-staff and numerous tours and activities.

After you’ve taken the guided tour of Bordeaux and visited the historical, architectural, and cultural sites, stick around for a night on the town. Qais de Bordeaux is a beautiful waterfront setting where you’ll find delicious cuisine, bustling bars, and even more wine. If you feel like working on your tan, Arcachon Bay’s golden shores and sparkling waters are about an hour from Chartreuse. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With a spa area, home theater and attentive staff, Chalet Perla is more than a luxury ski villa—it feels like your own private resort. This stunning four-level, four-bedroom vacation rental has more than 8,000 square feet of beautifully appointed living space and can easily accommodate up to eight friends or family members. Its incredible location in Cortina offers panoramic mountain views, convenient access to several ski lifts, and shopping, dining, museums and more within a short walk.

Your holiday at Chalet Perla includes housekeeping, butler and driver service. The villa’s five-star amenities, from an indoor pool and home theater to a fitness area and games room, will leave you feeling pampered and refreshed. After a day on the slopes, leave gear in the heated ski-storage shed and head straight for the spa and wellness area, which has a sauna, Turkish bath, hot tub and more. If you’ll be entertaining, the sound system, wet bar and wine cellar make it easy.

The chalet pairs charming traditional exteriors with comfortable modern interiors. The spacious main living area encourages guests to gather with cozy sitting areas in front of the fireplace, a wet bar and games table tucked into a corner. The room flows into a TV lounge, dramatic formal dining area with a live-edge table and a sleek fully equipped kitchen laid out around a center island.

The four bedrooms at Chalet Perla were designed as suites and are luxe enough for a honeymoon, with en-suite bathrooms, jetted tubs, lounge areas and balconies. There are two bedrooms with queen beds, one with a double bed and one master suite with a king bed.

A location overlooking the promenade in Cortina means chalet guests are less than a 10-minute walk from three ski lifts, and less than a 10-minute drive from three more. Though the town landed on the map as a winter sports paradise after hosting the Winter Olympics, its history goes back thousands of years—and can be explored at local museums and churches a short walk or drive from Chalet Perla. If you’d like to see more of the Veneto region, spend part of a day visiting the nearby Forte Tre Sassi, a historic fortress tucked into the Alps.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located amongst the rolling hillside, wineries, and lavender fields of the French Riviera, Villa La Casa enjoys a secluded and spacious property, just far enough from the bustling city of Saint Tropez to visit within a short drive, yet enjoy the utmost privacy of the countryside. With luxurious accommodations for sixteen and plenty of indoor/outdoor hosting space, this Riviera farmhouse is the perfect setting for a special event, destination wedding, or family reunion. In the surrounding area, you’ll find some of France’s most beautiful villages and beaches, all yours to discover on your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.

From its exterior, Villa La Casa has all the rustic-chic charm that you’d expect from a high-end French Riviera farmhouse. The tiled roof, ancient brick walls, and lush greenery are sure to soothe your soul with authentic Old World atmosphere. Inside, the mood takes a delightful turn to the modern, with white walls acting as a canvas for an extensive collection of contemporary works of art.

Villa La Casa’s breathtaking estate is ideal for large groups thanks to its numerous lounge areas, swimming pool, hot tub, and private gardens. There’s always somewhere to find a space to break away for more intimate moments, as well as full group gatherings. Inside, the villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, satellite television, air conditioning, and a full kitchen. And, Villa La Casa comes with daily housekeeping, and weekly pool and garden maintenance.

Just under four kilometers from home, you’ll find the vibrant city of Saint Tropez, known for its pristine beachfront and narrow streets lined with bakeries, cafes, fine French restaurants, and exciting nightlife destinations. Even closer, you’ll love spending your afternoons relaxing on Canoubiers and Capon beaches; both are just under two kilometers away. Travel a little further, and you’ll find the iconic beaches of Pampelonne, known for their sandy coves and secluded inlets. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Saint Tropez Golf Club is just a few minutes away as well.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With close-up views of the Spanish Steps, Condotti Street, and Rome’s stunning rooftop skyline, The Nest’s central location cannot be beaten. Just a short walk from numerous attractions, museums, restaurants, and cafes, this five-bedroom luxury penthouse is the perfect home base for a family vacation or retreat with friends and colleagues. All five bedrooms feature king-sized beds and modern en-suite bathrooms. And, the rooftop patio and spacious lounge areas make The Nest ideal for hosting. A vacation rental this spacious in the center of Rome is an incredible find.

Inside, The Nest is decorated with marble flooring, chandelier lighting, Romanesque works of art, and designer furniture. Dark wood accents and state of the art electronics and appliances add a touch of sleek, modern style to the old-world influence of The Nest’s luxurious atmosphere. The rooftop terrace is like your own private cafe, with a striped awning and authentic clay roofing tiles, it’s the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or a nightcap after an incredible day.

The Nest’s tech features include Wi-Fi, television, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. At breakfast, you can enjoy a complimentary buffet every day, and Espresso from the machine in the fully equipped kitchen. On the rooftop terrace, there’s an alfresco dining area and a furnished lounge on the opposite side. And, if you need a little extra sleeping space, there’s a sofa bed in the living room.

Within a short walk from your luxurious downtown penthouse, you’ll have access to dozens of Rome’s most famous sites, like the Spanish Steps, Piazza di Spagna, and the Pantheon. Truly an amazing walking city, every inch of Rome is steeped in historical significance. If you’d like to do some shopping at high-end fashion houses, Via Condotti is two minutes away. For dinner, Pierluigi is just a short walk towards the River Tiber; it’s one of Rome’s most famous restaurants. Travel across the river, and you’ll find Vatican City. And, just under fifteen minutes away, by car, you could visit the Roman Forum, the Colosseum, and Campo De’ Fiori.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Craft the perfect pie in the outdoor pizza oven while you gaze upon the rolling hillside of Tuscany at this fairy-tale farmhouse in Casole d’ Elsa. Awaken each morning to fresh country-air, fragrant gardens, and a feeling of peaceful solitude. After a family meal at the breakfast table in the chef’s kitchen, discuss sightseeing plans. Then, head out to discover Siena, Florence, and Montalcino.

From the peaks of the exposed-wood ceiling to the stone-tiled floors, Pietti is a true testament to authentic Tuscan architecture. Decorated with stately furniture, four-post beds, and chandelier lighting, you’ll feel like you’ve stepped back to simpler, elegant times. Stone archways link each room and lead outside to the scenic terrace, where you can stretch out in a sun lounger beside the refreshing pool.

Before dinner, pick the perfect pairing for your meal in the wine cellar. After, set the kids up with a movie in the upstairs family room. Then, throw a log on the fire, mix up a couple of bellinis, and sink into the plush sofa while chatting with old friends. Later in the night, move the party to the terrace lounge or hop into the hot tub. Daily housekeeping will refresh the villa in the morning.

The nearest town, Siena, dates back to the Etruscan era with most of its growth taking place in the Middle-Ages. Today, Siena has one of the most intriguing skylines in the country. On your approach, you’ll see Torre del Mangia, the town’s highest lookout tower. The view from the top is well worth the journey, and the pictures are unbeatable. After, treat yourself to dinner at Gordon Ramsey’s Castel Monastero.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled into the heart of Rome, this luxurious two-bedroom apartment enjoys a prestigious location, just steps away from some of the Eternal City’s most coveted monuments. Piazza di Spagna 90 is a gorgeous apartment, perfect for a family vacation or romantic honeymoon, with an incredible view of the Spanish Steps. Each bedroom features a king or queen sized bed and an en-suite or private bathroom, equipped with a jetted-tub and hydromassage shower.

This elegant apartment is decorated with designer furnishings, high-end electronics, and a collection of contemporary art. The cream walls and medium-wood flooring create a soothing warmth, perfect for rest and relaxation, yet formal enough to celebrate the most important occasions. The living room and master bedroom both have scenic views of the Spanish Steps and plaza below, as well as plush furniture to melt into after an exciting day wandering the ancient streets of Rome.

Piazza di Spagna 90 comes with a fully-equipped kitchen, Espresso machine, and a formal dining area with seating for four. The apartment is outfitted with air conditioning, Wi-Fi, television. The villa also includes a complimentary buffet breakfast during your stay.

Make sure to have a camera on you at all times, especially when wandering the streets surrounding the villa, as you’ll find Piazza del Popolo, Fontana di Trevi, Via Del Corso, and the Pantheon, within a fifteen-minute walk of home. Some of Rome’s other “must-see” attractions are Castel Sant’Angelo, Campo De’Fiori, The Colosseum, and the Roman Forum, all of which are accessible in a fifteen-minute drive. If you’re in the mood to shop, Via Condotti, a two-minute walk from home, is an amazing shopping area, lined with some of the most exclusive fashion houses in the World. And, when you’re hungry, you’ll find incredible Italian restaurants on every corner, but a great place to start is Il Palazzetto; it’s very close to home and has a beautiful patio and view of the Spanish Steps.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Suderi is an old and beautiful colonial era house, located in the Sicilian countryside not far from the impressive Selinunte excavations facing the sea and several delightful beaches. You will be enchanted by the quaint Italian charms of Selinunte. The villa is located only a jaunt away from the beaches of Menfi and to Tre Fontane, so you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Mediterranean holiday.

This villa is surrounded by a wonderful palm tree garden where the infinity swimming pool merges in a brilliant balance with the natural environment. The estate enjoys all around views of the picturesque Mediterranean countryside and offers utmost privacy. Your reservation includes access to a property manager who speaks English and French and will happily attend to all of your questions and requests. Villa Suderi provides all of the modern luxury comforts that make a vacation relaxing and hassle free including a jetted tub, patio, Wi-Fi and DVD player.

The property is set in an expansive, fenced estate where olive trees enrich the various pathways. Rustic, yet modern decor adorns the property, and soft leather couches are a pleasure to curl up on while enjoying a fabulous glass of wine in the inviting living area. The kitchen at Villa Suderi is a chef’s dream. Both homey and practical, the fully equipped kitchen features stone walls, gorgeous wooden doors and a dishwasher.

Enjoy the master bedroom with a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. A total of four bedrooms accommodates eight fortunate guests at Villa Suderi in total Italian resplendence. Each bedroom offers a unique set of charms and the ambience acts as lullaby providing soothing nights of sleep.

The ruins of Selinunte are some of the most impressive of the Ancient Greek world, and the site is one of the most captivating in Sicily. Selinos (as it was known to the Greeks) was once one of the richest and most powerful cities in the world, with over 100,000 inhabitants and an unrivalled temple-building program. With all sorts of activities at your grasp, you can visit archeological sights, nature reserves, museums, beaches and historical sites during your stay at this spectacular Italian villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the Cote d'Azur, between Nice and Cannes, Villa Jennifer is a gorgeous five-bedroom luxury rental with more than ample hosting space, both inside and out. Its private terrace is protected by lush greenery, making it quite secluded, even though it's just minutes from the beach and downtown Antibes.

Jennifer's all white exterior contrasts perfectly with the vibrant greens and blues of the French Riviera, making it a standout like a beacon, hinting at the luxuries within. When you design using only the best materials, it's easy to keep decor simple. Showcasing elements like warm wood flooring, marble fixtures, and modern-contemporary art creates an elegant space that excites guests while maintaining a calming atmosphere. The open-concept interior also celebrates the natural surroundings with floor-to-ceiling glass and numerous openings to the terrace.

Beyond Jennifer's electric gate, you'll find a highly functional space for your next Luxury Retreat. With Wi-Fi, underfloor heating, a fireplace, air conditioning, and office space, Jennifer has the highest quality of modern amenities. The fully equipped kitchen boasts state of the art stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. There are formal and alfresco dining areas, both with space for the whole group. On the terrace, you'll love cooling off in the swimming pool, and relaxing in one of the lounge chairs under a parasol. When it's time to retire for the evening, each of Jennifer's five bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, television, and double bed.

At just thirteen kilometers away, Cannes is definitely worth a day trip, maybe even one that turns into a night out. A great walking city, Cannes is well-known for its historic architecture, easily found throughout the downtown area. Museums, theatres, cinemas, art galleries, and live music venues are abundant in this cultural hub. And, for dinner, you'll have a vast selection of world-class dining. From breezy beachfront bars to the finest French cuisine imaginable, Cannes has it all.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get a taste of life in the Tuscan countryside at villa Fagnana. The restored farm, whose eight bedrooms are divided between a former farmhouse and barn, offers a quiet, private getaway spot that’s still conveniently close to cities like Pisa, Florence, Siena and Lucca. Enjoy the timeless setting of rolling hills dotted with traditional buildings from a home that’s been updated with modern luxuries.

The property’s outdoor spaces make it easy to appreciate its rural setting on an estate once owned by the bankers to the Medici family. The kitchen and living room open to a large terrace with a barbecue shaded dining table, and a smaller table perfect for breakfast or a snack. Down a flight of steps, you’ll find the inground pool, which is surrounded by its own terrace, loungers and gazebo. The villa itself is air-conditioned and has Wi-Fi in the main areas and a VoIP phone, plus a laptop, iPod and baby equipment upon request.

Fagnana’s interiors still have their traditional bones but have been given a fresh, modern update. In the living rooms, you’ll find classic Tuscan Cotto floors, large fireplaces, and beamed ceilings set off by clean-lined, neutral-toned sofas and glass-topped side tables. The quiet, spacious dining room pairs an antique console with a simple farmhouse table and chairs. In the kitchen, which is open to the dining room, modern appliances like a large gas range are tucked into pale wood cabinets and open upper shelving.

There are seven bedrooms in the main house and one bedroom in the former barn (now a guest cottage). In the main house, the ground floor features a bedroom with a queen bed and an en-suite bathroom. Upstairs, you’ll find two bedrooms with a king bed and en-suite bathroom and two bedrooms with a queen bed and shared bathroom. A bedroom with a single bed and another bedroom with a single bed share a bathroom. In the guest cottage, there’s a bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom.

Since Fagnana is located on a 1,700-acre estate, there’s plenty to explore on foot, like the private church that’s a 15-minute walk away. By car, it’s 10 minutes to shopping, dining and a tennis court in the town of Forcoli, and 15 minutes to the hospital and train station in Pontedera. Just 20 minutes away, you’ll find the Castelfalfi golf course, and the beaches in Pisa and Tirrenia are 45 minutes away. The Pisa airport is 40 minutes away, and the Florence airport is a 60-minute drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Villa Saletta estate, once owned by the Riccardi family (bankers to the Medici), covers approximately 1,760 acres. In total, there are more than 20 old farmhouses on the estate, mostly dating back to the 1800s. Each one has its own story to tell, being unique and individual in size and location.
Three of these farmhouses have been restored so far. Every restored villa has its own private grounds with electric gates, outdoor swimming pool, barbecue and comfortable shaded seating areas.

It was then refurbished in 2004 to give it an updated feel and add more modern conveniences. It is set on very private, secure grounds and, being situated in the hills, provides excellent views towards Pisa and spectacular sunsets.
Opposite the main entrance to the house is the Limonaia, a separate building which has a large double bedroom with en-suite bathroom.

An open terrace for outdoor dining runs the length of the house at the rear, complete with barbeque. The terrace overlooks the private, enclosed garden featuring a large area of lawn with mature olive trees and attractive flower beds. A swimming pool with its own sun terrace completes the picture.
Please note estate roads are not suitable for vehicles with poor ground clearance

listing.listing_description:
Be among the first to stay at Christiania Apartment 7. This three-bedroom vacation rental is just one of the residences in the exclusive, newly built Christiania development, which boasts modern style and luxury in an enviable location in the center of Zermatt. Invite up to six friends or family members to share a memorable Swiss Alps holiday.

Apartment 7 is available on a self-catered basis, which includes ski- and boot-fitting service and lift-pass delivery, or a fully catered basis, which includes chef and driver service, ski instruction, pre-dinner canapés with champagne on certain evenings and a selection of beverages. Your stay also includes the use of the shared ski storage and gym, as well as the apartment’s private TV, DVD player and Wi-Fi.

A wall of windows frames stunning views of the Matterhorn and floods the great room with light. The L-shaped space features a sitting area with a sleek, wood-burning fireplace, a dining table with mid-century-inspired seating for twelve, and a minimalist yet fully equipped kitchen with high-gloss cabinetry and a breakfast bar.

Each of the six bedrooms at Apartment 7 has a double bed and en-suite bathroom; three of the six open to the terrace as well. If needed, the beds can be separated into two twin beds. Upholstered headboards, plush throws and mod accent chairs make each bedroom a serene haven.

A setting in the heart of Zermatt gives guests easy access to the town’s pedestrian-friendly streets, charming shops and array of restaurants, perfect for an après-ski pick-me-up or a full-on honeymoon-worthy dinner out. It’s less than 500 meters from Christiania to Matterhorn Glacier Paradise, which affords direct access to the ski area, and less than a 10-minute walk to the Klein Matterhorn and Sunnegga ski lifts.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This family-owned Tuscan villa is the genuine article in every way, with the local Cori family having lived here for 70 years. Its shady, comfortable interior, original facade and rambling gardens and groves will delight any true fan of Italian country living. Located at the region’s heart, the historic cities, peerless wine, unique food and countryside serenity of Tuscany are yours to experience. 

Simple but spacious, the traditional interiors maintain all the shapes and contours of the original estate house. A sunlit patio dining area is the perfect place to taste the fruits of the region, from fresh bruschetta, to regional Finocchiona salami and olive-dashed salad. Sunlight flows through wooden shutters of the fully restored house, as guests can make themselves at home in the comfortable, fully-furnished living room and refurbished bathroom. Feel the pleasure of taking the morning air from the private balcony, and savor the views of the flower gardens, active vineyards and olive trees that surround the building. With a sizable pool (complete with sun recliners) and hot tub tucked away in the gardens nearby, refreshment is never far, especially after a game of tennis on the nearby clay court. 

This home’s position gives guests a wealth of day-trip options. Choose to explore the nearby countryside via that most Italian mode of transport, the scooter, or wind your way among charming lines with a bicycle, with both options rented nearby. Less than an hour’s drive away, the historic grandeur of both Florence and Sienna beckon. With Castellare de Sernigi, visitors can count on the local touch, with the hosts standing by to provide recommendations on restaurants, outings and famed Chianti wineries. To top things off, a seated night-time concert is often held under the eaves of a tree on the property - with the magic of local musicians instilling a sense of place and peace in guests as the night draws in. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled into the quaint countryside of Chianti, on the outskirts of Florence, this eight bedroom is the perfect host for a family reunion, high-end corporate event, and with its own on-site chapel, Vitigliano is an amazing wedding destination. Complete with its own wellness center, spacious interior and exterior living areas, and multiple dining venues, Vitigliano is among the most exclusive in Tuscany. Located between Florence and Siena, you’ll have no trouble navigating your way around some of Tuscany’s most famous attractions.

Vitigliano has all the authentic, elegant charm you’d expect from such a prestigious Tuscan villa. The exposed wood beams, natural stone accents, arched doorways, and brick ceilings show off the villa’s historic side, while designer furniture, high-end electronics, and stylish contemporary design display the luxuries of today. Vitigliano’s eight bedrooms are all outfitted with king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, and a separate sitting or living area.

The perfect dinner setting awaits in one of four dining areas at villa Vitigliano. Inside, the formal dining area has seating for eighteen. Outside, you’ll find three more alfresco dining areas, all with seating for twenty. The fully equipped kitchen, wine cellar, barbecue, and outdoor kitchenette will make meal prep a breeze. For some fun in the sun, you’ll appreciate the villa’s fenced-in swimming pool, hot tub, alfresco shower, and children’s play area. And inside, you’ll enjoy Wi-Fi, a sound system, fireplace, air conditioning, an exercise room, and more.

Just thirty-kilometers from home, you’ll have quick and easy access to Florence, one of Italy’s most important arts and culture hubs. The home of Michelangelo’s David, ancient architecture, World-renowned museums, and Michelin-starred restaurants, Florence is always an exciting place to spend an afternoon, and evening. Closer to home, you’ll find plenty of wine tasting opportunities in Greve, one of Chianti’s many vineyard areas. And, if you’re in the mood to visit the beach, you’ll find pristine white sand, and an almost Caribbean-like atmosphere, just over an hour away on Spiagge Bianche.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The prestigious Verbier Resort is one of the most sought after ski vacation destinations in Europe. At Chalet Sagarmata you'll experience the full spectrum of Swiss luxury: world-class skiing, incomparable mountain views, opulent spas and an endless list of extravagant activities. With accommodations for thirteen and effortless ski access, this private rental is perfect for a large family, corporate retreat, or an alpine adventure with friends.

Modern contemporary elegance with state of the art features set the tone in this mountain home’s interior. Touches of wood, stone, leather, and fur hint at the ski lodge’s rustic tradition, while sleek and stylish design and an open-concept layout ensure the highest standard in the luxuries of today. In the living room, floor-to-ceiling windows frame beautiful mountain landscapes. A wood burning fireplace, flat screen television, and comfortable seating for your entire group makes the living room the perfect hangout spot at the end of an exciting day. The dining area features an amazing oak table with space for twenty-four. Beside it, the fully equipped kitchen is stocked with state of the art appliances, sure to inspire your inner chef. And, if you need a little extra space, there’s a family suite upstairs with an additional lounge, kitchenette, and two bedrooms.

From the indoor garage and ski storage to the pool side terrace, Sagarmata is loaded with relaxing, functional, and exciting features. The salt water pool is perfect for swimming laps, while the plunge pool is a great place to quickly cool off after a long day on the slopes. If you’re looking for something more relaxing, the sauna, spa, and private hammam will sooth and rejuvenate you for tomorrow’s adventure. And, to keep life simple, daily housekeeping, a private chef, wine, beer, driving service, and even ski instructions are included with rental.

For quick and easy ski access, Mayenzet, Savoleyres, and Medran lift stations are all within five minutes, driving, from Sagarmata. For restaurants, shops, and nightlife, head to Verbier Place Central, also only five minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Admire the stone towers of nearby San Gimignano from the garden of this private, distinct Tuscany villa. Steeped in rich regional history, the crafted interior features classical sculptures and rich wood surfaces. Outside, a lamplit terrace offers open-air relaxation, while an infinity pool underscores lush countryside views. Medieval ruins, galleries and country restaurants are all nearby.

The vineyards and rolling hills of Tuscany surround this tasteful home, which has been constructed with both local style and interior luxury emphasized. Features like the echoing stone staircase, carved wooden tables and golden lamps are gentle notes in an uncluttered, welcoming interior. Pleasant bedrooms are perfected with veiled, 4 poster beds, which promise an unbroken night’s sleep in completely air-conditioned comfort. Experience a refreshing dive into the pool, or a decadent soak in the hot tub after an active day as local meats and produce sizzles on the villa’s barbecue.

The rich attractions of Tuscany are on the doorstep of Villa Sara. The town of San Gimignano is visibly close by, offering exceptional examples of medieval architecture, sweeping piazzas and its world-famous stone towers. The ancient stone fountains of the Fonti Medievali are nearby, offering an insight into the storied Lombard history of the region. The distinct traditions of the region is reflected in nearby roadside restaurants, where cured meats and delicate soups abound, as well as local wineries offering the delicate crispness of Vernaccia wine, which is unique to this region.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
When it comes to superb locations, few Amalfi Coast villas can rival Positanese. Enviably situated in the heart of Positano, this four-bedroom villa is within easy walking distance of local restaurants in this charming seaside town. Better yet, for beach lovers, it’s just a two-minute walk down to Positano’s pebbled beach - about 170 steps.

While the Positanese interiors are appealing, the highlight of the home is undoubtedly the spacious terrace, with its hand-painted floor tiles and spectacular views of the ornate church cupola, the town of Positano, and the islands beyond - the perfect backdrop for al fresco meals or a lazy afternoon of sunbathing. After a day of sightseeing, come back here for a pre-dinner glass of wine with your guests.

Light and bright, Positanese's elegant interiors open onto the terrace through arched doorways with wrought-iron details. Traditional yet comfortable, the villa features vaulted ceilings and tiled floors throughout the dining room and living room. The well-equipped Italian style kitchen has direct access to both the dining room and terrace, for both indoor and al fresco dining options.

The beautiful Amalfi Coast views continue upstairs, where two bedrooms have small private balconies framed by the bright pink bougainvillea growing up the villa wall. Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is conveniently equipped with a private en-suite bathroom, as well as a flat-screen television.

Among the most picturesque towns in Italy, Positano is famed for its beautiful pastel-painted buildings, pebbled beach, and heavenly Italian restaurants.  Positanese is ideal base for exploring Amalfi Coast attractions, from historic sites to winery tours. When on the Amalfi Coast, the quickest route is often by sea - ask your Concierge about local hydrofoil service or private boat charters to Capri, Sorrento and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
