listing.listing_description:
Equidistant to Ibiza town and Sant Antoni de Portmany, the secluded estate of Can Felipe is the perfect escape from the bustling cities, twenty-minutes from home. With luxurious accommodations for twelve, spread across six en-suite bedrooms, spacious interiors, and a beautifully landscaped property, decorated with fruit trees and vegetable gardens, Can Felipe boasts an incredible amount of hosting space. Travel just ten minutes from Can Felipe’s private estate, and you’ll find the pristine beaches of Es Torrent and Cala Jondal, as well as the village of San Jose.

With soft white edges, soothing cream tones, and warm wooden accents, Can Felipe’s interior is an instantly relaxing environment. The open-air design of the villa allows a fresh breeze, natural sunlight, and guests to flow barrier-free from inside to out, fully embracing Ibiza’s beautiful climate. Inside, you’ll find numerous living spaces, an exercise room, library, formal dining area, and a fully-equipped kitchen, with an espresso machine and cold press juicer.

Outside, Can Felipe has a luxurious list of amenities similar to its interior. You’ll appreciate the outdoor kitchen, alfresco dining with en-suite bathroom, lounge, and speaker system, all on the terrace. The swimming pool and hot tub are easy to enjoy with the help of the Pool House, and you’ll find sun loungers lining the pool’s edge as well. If you’re traveling with children, the kids play area is top notch, complete with a trampoline, clubhouses, a jungle gym, and more.

The island of Ibiza is famously known for its vibrant beachfront nightlife. You’ll find some of the World’s most popular nightclubs in Ibiza Town on the island’s east coast, and Sant Antoni de Portmany, on the west. If you’d prefer something a little more laid-back, Old Town Ibiza’s winding alleyways and cobblestone streets are the perfect places to spend an evening. Whether you’ve scouted out a few locations for dinner, like La Casita or La Bodega, or you’d prefer to wander, you’re sure to find delicious Spanish cuisine in Old Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunny and secluded, Casa Hermosa is the perfect vacation destination for a multi-family vacation, especially if you’re traveling with kids. Located on a property decorated with lush greenery, gardens, and palm trees, this beautiful three bedroom is just outside of Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Town, and San Rafael, all within ten kilometers. With such proximity, the island of Ibiza is yours to discover on your next incredible Luxury Retreats vacation.

Casa Hermosa is decorated in a soothing mix of white, terracotta, and wood tones. The living areas are open concept, with large doorways to the terrace, giving the whole villa an airy, natural feeling. High-end electronics and designer furniture decorate the common areas. And, outside, you’ll love spending lazy afternoons stretched out in the sun beds on the terrace.

The perfect host for family friends, Casa Hermosa, is equipped with a full kitchen, formal and alfresco dining for ten, and plenty of parking within its gated property. After dinner, enjoy an exciting night lounging by the pool while the kids play on a wide variety of sports, game, and playground equipment, or settle down inside for a movie at the home theatre. When it’s time for bed, each suite is outfitted with a king sized bed and en-suite bathroom. The two master bedrooms come with privy entrances, and kitchenettes as well.

Ibiza is well known for its vibrant nightlife, which consists of beachfront dance parties, a wide range of bars, and some of the best nightclubs on the planet. Ibiza Town and Sant Antoni de Portmany have a friendly rivalry over which city has the better nightlife scene, but both are incredible. If you’d prefer something a little more low-key, Old Town Ibiza is where you’ll find the finest dining, set in fourteenth-century architecture. And, you’ll probably want to check out a beach or two while you’re in Ibiza. The closest is Playa d’en Bossa, which is eleven kilometers from home. After that, you’ll find Cala Conta, Cala Tarida, and Cala Jondal, all around eighteen kilometers from Casa Hermosa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Once a farmhouse and hayloft, the recently restored villa Valle is now a luxurious country retreat. With seven bedrooms divided between the main house and guest cottage and expansive yet private outdoor spaces, the property gives guests plenty of room to relax. But it’s also in the heart of Tuscany, close enough to the cities of Pisa, Florence, Siena and Lucca for day trips.

Restored in 2007, the villa is now air-conditioned and has a Wi-Fi connection and gated access. The enclosed garden has a broad lawn and bocce court, and the main house and guest cottage are connected by a terrace with a pool, barbecue and outdoor dining area. Adults can while away the afternoon over a book in the sun room, and kids can entertain themselves in the billiards room.

The interiors of Valle are warm and comfortable, drawing country charm from restored rustic fireplaces and beamed ceilings in the living spaces. With warm yellow walls, damask drapes and traditional-style furnishings, the living room is cozy and welcoming. A formal dining room is decorated in rich, earthy Tuscan reds and golds that glow under a chandelier and sconces. The sunny, modern eat-in kitchen has stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar.

There are five bedrooms in the villa’s main house and two bedrooms in the guest cottage. In the main house, you’ll find three bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with a queen bed. Each of the five bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. In the guest house, there’s one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with a single bed; both are air-conditioned and have bathroom access.

During your stay, take the time to stroll the estate on which the villa is located, or walk to the local church, 15 minutes away. By car, it’s only 5 minutes to downtown, which offers a grocery store, restaurant and seasonal truffle sales and tastings. A tennis court and clinic are 10 minutes away, and a hospital and train station are 36 km away. Enjoy a leisurely afternoon at the golf course, 45 km away, or the beach, 48 km away. When it’s time to leave, it’s a 35 km drive to the airport.

feature.p: Villa Saletta estate, once owned by the Riccardi family (bankers to the Medici), covers approximately 1,760 acres. In total, there are more than 20 old farmhouses on the estate, mostly dating back to the 1800s. Each one has its own story to tell, being unique and individual in size and location.
Three of these farmhouses have been restored so far. Every restored villa has its own private grounds with electric gates, outdoor swimming pool, barbecue and comfortable shaded seating areas.
Please note estate roads are not suitable for vehicles with poor ground clearance.
